content.rendered:
News

2021

  • June 9, 2021
    Foundation Fellowship
    Postdoctoral fellow Shuo Wang is awarded the fellowship of China Postdoctoral Science Foundation.
  • May 21, 2021
    Commencement
    Congratulations to our graduate students Biao Song and Tingting Fan! 
    Wish them all the best in the future!
  • May 19, 2021
    Commencement
    Xia Li has successfully defended his Ph.D. dissertation. 
    Congratulations on your graduation and best wishes for your next adventure, Dr. Xia Li!
  • May 14, 2021 - May 15, 2021
    Pathogenesis and early intervention of senile osteoarthropathy 
    老年骨关节病发病机理与早期干预，香山科学会议
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Guests
  • May 12, 2021
    Symposium of China Science and Technology Exchange Center
    Institute of Zoology
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Speaker
  • May 11, 2021
    Lectures on Frontiers of Regenerative Medicine Science
    University of Chinese Academy of Sciences Medical School
    Biofabrication and Cell Fate
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Speaker
  • April 29, 2021
    The 5th Forum on Membrane Biology and Human Major Diseases, 2021
    Participants: Feng Liu, Qiang Wang, Moshi Song
    Speakers: Zhixin Kang, Wenhui Huang
  • March 25, 2021 - March 27, 2021
    The 3rd Chinese Symposium on Tissue and Organ Regeneration
    Zhoushan, Zhejiang, China
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Section Speaker
  • March 22, 2021
    Preprint 
    We are excited to share our recent preprint on 3D printing multivascular tissues preprinted. Thanks to collaborators Prof Zheng (SIA) and Prof Wang (ICCAS).
  • March 13, 2021
    New Member
    Welcome joint Postdoctoral fellow Shuyu Zhang to join our team!
    Shuyu Zhang will focus on pharmacokinetic (PK)-pharmacodynamic (PD) modeling based on multiorgan-on-a-chip (MOC) device.

2020

  • December 19, 2020
    New Member
    Welcome Postdoctoral fellow Shen Ji to join our team!
    Shen Ji will focus on the bioprinting of large-scale vascularized tissue/organs.
  • October 10, 2020 | 08:00 AM - October 13, 2020 | 05:00 PM
    The 10th Annual Conference of Chinese Society for Stem Cell Research (CSSCR)
    Guiyang, China
    Bioinspired Engineering
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Section Speaker
  • September 1, 2020
    New Member
    Welcome Postdoctoral fellow Shuo Wang to join our team!
    Shuo Wang will focus on engineering large-sized skeletal muscle tissue by using novel approaches.
  • July 7, 2020
    Foundation Fellowship
    Postdoctoral fellow Xinhuan Wang is awarded the fellowship of China Postdoctoral Science Foundation.

2019

  • December 9, 2019 - December 12, 2019
    The 17th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering, Singapore
    Prof. Qi Gu, Invited Section Speaker
  • October 14, 2019 - October 17, 2019
    Tissue Engineering & Regenerative Medicine International Society
    AP Chapter and the 7th Asian Biomaterials Congress, Brisbane, Australia
    Bioink Development for Stem Cells and Tissue Engineering
    Prof. Qi Gu, Section Chair, Invited Speaker
